Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.UI_J2D

Class J2DGraphicsContext

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.UI_J2D.J2DGraphicsContext
public class J2DGraphicsContext extends Object
The J2DGraphicsContext class manages the graphical context in a Java 2D-based game. It handles rendering, loading images, and setting up the game dimensions.
Author:
Ahmad Shakleya

      public BufferedImage resizeImage(BufferedImage originalImage, int targetWidth, int targetHeight)
      Resize the given BufferedImage to the specified target width and height.
      Parameters:
      originalImage - The original BufferedImage to be resized.
      targetWidth - The target width for resizing.
      targetHeight - The target height for resizing.
      Returns:
      The resized BufferedImage.
